143001. The Iberian Revolts

Catalonia — Not random

Conditions

  • Catalonia is a vassal of Spain
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Event 260161 - War of Acclamation for Portugal has already occurred
    • Event 260162 - War of Acclamation for Portugal has already occurred
    • Event 260163 - War of Acclamation for Portugal has already occurred
    • Event 285295 - Unrest in Catalonia for Spain has already occurred

Will happen within 10 days of January 2, 1639
Checked again every 10 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1645)

Description

We have been outraged by Olivares's demand to sacrifice our ancient rights and privileges for a Spanish empire...

Actions

A. OK

  • Break vassalization with Spain
  • -200 relations with Spain

Back to top

143002. French Support

Catalonia — Not random

Conditions

  • France exists
  • Event 285295 - Unrest in Catalonia for Spain has already occurred
  • None of the following must occur:
    • Aragon exists
    • Spain and France are allied
    • France is a vassal of Spain
    • Catalonia is a vassal of Spain
    • Spain is a vassal of France
    • France and Catalonia are at war

Will happen within 10 days of January 2, 1639
Checked again every 10 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1649)

Description

Unable to placate the fury of the Catalonian populace and afraid of the approaching Castilian army, Pau Claris proclaimed Catalonia an independent republic under French protection. However, as the French were unwilling to support a republican government, Claris quickly abandoned his plans for the government and announced Catalonia's allegiance to France.

Actions

A. Beg for it!

  • -200 relations with Spain
  • +50 relations with France
  • Event 170320 - The Catalonian Revolt for France is triggered immediately

B. We can manage on our own

  • Stability -2
  • -100 relations with Spain
  • Aristocracy -1
  • Centralization +2
  • Start a war with Spain

Back to top

143000. Catalonia under siege

Catalonia — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 187000 - The parliament of Barcelona declares Charles King for HSP has already occurred

Will happen on July 9, 1713

Description

On the 9th of July 1713, with the Bourbon armies surrounding Barcelona, the three arms of the Barcelona courts voted on what to do. The military and ecclesiastic branches voted at first to come to terms, but in the popular arm, representing the third state, war was decided by 78 to 45 votes, forcing a turn of the tide for an all-out hopeless resistance.

Actions

A. Declare war to the Bourbon usurper

  • Start a war with Spain

B. Submit to the Bourbon King

  • Stability +4
  • Event 285216 - Felipe wins the crown of Spain for Spain is triggered immediately

Back to top

143004. A few measly French coins

Catalonia — Not random

Triggered by

Action B of 170320 - The Catalonian Revolt for France

Description

The French were unwilling to provide overt support for the Catalonian rebellion.

Actions

A. Oh no!

  • +25
  • -40 relations with France
  • Start a war with Spain

Back to top

143003. The French Principality of Catalonia

Catalonia — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 170320 - The Catalonian Revolt for France

Description

The French agreed to honor Catalonia's pledge of allegiance and quickly dispatched troops to defend Barcelona.

Actions

A. Wonderful!

  • +10000 infantry in Catalunya
  • +5000 infantry in a random province
  • +100
  • +50 relations with France
  • Start a war with Spain
